Html:
Hey all,

Just wanted to drop a line saying both "Thanks!" for the awesome styles, and that I have adapted the Vancouver format for use in the journal Biomaterials.  I'm sure there are still flaws in it, but this fixes the main problems related to in-text citation style, bibliography numbering style, and the page style (gets rid of the "p." before the numbers).  It also adds a period in a couple of places where they were previously missing.  It can be downloaded from my blog post for those who are interested.

All the best,
Patrick Bowen
Graduate Student
Michigan Technological University
